backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features for the Veebirstays landing page, including property showcase, amenities display, booking CTA, property details, and visual design with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components, styling, and configuration for the Veebirstays property landing page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, featuring warm earthy tones (terracotta, warm white, sage green) for hospitality aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, page title for Veebirstays, and Google Fonts preconnect for Inter and Playfair Display fonts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that composes the landing page layout with PropertyHero, PropertyGallery, PropertyInfo, AmenitiesSection, BookingCTA, and Footer components.
frontend/src/components/AmenitiesSection: Displays property amenities in a grid of cards with icons (WiFi, kitchen, TV, parking, etc.) and a banner image, using warm color scheme and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/BookingCTA.tsx: Call-to-action section with a prominent button that opens the Airbnb listing URL in a new tab for booking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with property info, quick links, policies, social media icons, and attribution to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
Photo gallery with carousel and grid layout displaying property images with smooth transitions and hover scale effects.
frontend/src/components/PropertyHero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with background image, Veebirstays title, location info, and CTA button that scrolls to booking section.
frontend/src/components/PropertyInfo.tsx: React component displaying property details (location, guests, bedrooms, bathrooms, property type) in a grid of cards with icons, plus an 'About This Space' section describing Veebirstays.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor using React Query, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for React Query hooks that interact with the backend; currently only exports useBackendQueries which wraps useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a warm, earthy color palette (terracotta, sage green, warm whites) with light/dark mode support using OKLCH color space and custom CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors (terracotta, sage, warm-white), container settings, custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the Veebirstays Airbnb rental website, including implemented features (landing page, amenities, booking CTA, property details, warm design aesthetic) and image requirements.
